0: Until about 430 when the place gets slammed with people tossing cups from one side of the pool to the other cups floating in the pool
However pool and beach are only few steps

First off it is supposed to be a family resort but I found many things that were inappropriate for kids my children were told they could not throw a ball purchased at the resort but there was an inflatable penis and beachball with breasts in it that were being thrown around the pool
There are several waiters by the pool so you are able to get drinks there
The only disappointing thing that I noticed is that many underage people were getting drunk and were even escorted away from the pool one day to only return the next and continue with the drinking
They also reuse the plastic cups by the pool and beach
The pool area had the usual 7 am towel dumpers to reserve beds but we always found three beds together after 9
I am not great with distance measurements but my guess is that the distance in the sand from the pool to the ocean exceeded a US football field 100 yards
A family resort is just down the beach and better suited for smaller children as there is a kidie pool and activities for them
So we got up early to reserve a spot around the pool area
1: Many pools with barstols in the one pool
The resort is beautiful but the buffet and pool bar staff are what made our trip
The pools were lovely with sun beds and stool seats in the water enjoyed the sunshine and the RIU hotel mostly catered for families friends
Our special thanks to barman Matos at the pool bar evening time after 7 pm
My brother dropped his phone in the pool and Robert consoled him in such a familial way
It was fun to watch the activities when at the bar pool previously
Today we did Sun salutation and a pool workout to combat all the good food
the grounds are lovely plenty of pools beautiful beach
Terrific service it must be saidAl the restaurants are on the ground floor pool level of the main block with reception one floor up
